data.title: Euphoria soundtrack: Full list of songs for seasons 1 and 2
data.meta_description: Labrinth and more feature on the soundtrack for Euphoria season 2 as the HBO drama series starring Zendaya is back on our screens
data.text:
The music used in the HBO teen drama Euphoria is an integral part of the show’s make-up.

Advertisement

Including original music by artist Labrinth and selecting an array of songs from across genres and various decades of music, we can always trust the series for a good beat.

The second season saw Rue Bennett (Zendaya) continue to struggle with her addiction issues whilst pursuing a romance with Jules Vaughn (Hunter Schafer).

The added complication of new arrival Elliot (played by musician Dominic Fike) does pose the potential for further heartbreak.

However, with heartbreak and romance for the cast of Euphoria comes the potential for great music choices.

More like this

We have some strong thoughts on why Labrinth's choice of music is so vital for Euphoria, but you'll also appreciate a full list for the show too.

So, without further ado, here is the complete soundtrack listing for Euphoria so far.

Euphoria season 1 soundtrack:
